title: Wonderful Beer
text: Visited together with friends and much enjoyed the SMOOTH CRIMINAL beer, great taste and very special

title: Very tasty food
text: Visited together with friends for lunch, the place was very busy with high demand as expected for real gem, all the dishes were great and we much enjoyed

title: Tasty seafood
text: Visited for lunch and enjoyed the food, simple place with tasty food and good selection of seafood options

title: Very nice place for food and drinks
text:
Visited there couple of times and keep enjoying the place and service
great food and great location, great place for team meeting for food and drinks

title: Great place with great beer
text:
Visited couple of times with friends and really like this place, they have their own beer and a great one, tasted few of them and all were very good and with high quality
Great place for beer and food with friends

title: Very nice and great experience
text: Visited with my son while the area was covered with snow, the breathtaking view and the special walk on the bridge was worth it

title: Very nice experience
text: Visited together with my friend and we had great fan, comparing to other places in world the chances to win in the slot machines seems to be much better

title: Great place to stay in Singapore
text:
Much enjoyed my stay in this lovely hotel, very good service and excellent breakfast with variety of dishes like the dumplings which keep being changed every day
Close to city center and the MRT station

title: Great Authentic food
text: Visited with local friend and enjoyed great lunch together with very tasty food, simple place with good service and great food

title: Great White Pepper Crab
text:
Visited this nice place and much enjoyed there great dish - White Pepper Crab
Great service and very nice stuff

title: Wonderful Zoo great for photographers
text: Very nice zoo, the lack of cages makes the difference and allow direct view of the animals, excellent for Animal photography

title: My favorite hotel in Bangalore
text:
Visited many times and really like the hotel and great service by the stuff
Great location near the center with access by walk to many restaurants, pubs and shops.
Tried the SPA several times and it was great

title: Great restaurant most recommended
text: Visited with my family and had great experience, very tasty Asian food and great service by the restaurant team, most recommend for lunch and dinner.

title: Great Experience
text:
Visited there together with my extended team from Bangalore, few of us took the tour by the jeep which is the preferred options for photographers, we have seen several type of animals but unfortunately didn't spot a tiger, it was close by based on the vocal alarm noise of the monkeys but we haven't manage to see it although it was there in the area.
We have seen elephant, many spotted deer, Boar, Bison, peacocks, squirrels and birds.
Overall experience was very nice and most recommended

title: Great stay with wonderful hospitality
text: Visited together with my extended team from Bangalore, we had great visit and enjoyed very much, very clean rooms and very tasty food, great hospitality and care by the owners which makes this place a great choice.

title: Lovely Bar in Chinatown
text:
Visited with my father and brother and order their signature cocktail
First taste was little bit strange, but then it is getting better and better.
I have noticed most of the customers ordered the same thing and I think it is indeed the right choice

title: Great Scenic Travel by train
text:
Joined this train ride and very enjoyed the beautiful view in the area
Better to book the first class ticket to ensure comfortable place since this is not a short ride.

title: Great place to stay near Yosemite
text: Stayed there while visiting Yosemite park, good choice of place to stay near Yosemite with several dining options in Mariposa, after two nights stay we decided to cancel the third night there since we decided to change our trip plan, the hotel stuff was very friendly and the cancellation done without extra charge
place: Best Western Plus Yosemite Way Station Motel

title: Very nice Vietnamese lunch
text:
Visited together with my brother and we both much enjoyed the lunch there
We had Spring Rolls and Chicken Noodles soups and taste of the food was great.

title: Great Dinner in Monterey
text:
Visited there with my father and brother and we consider it the bast restaurant we visited in Monterey.
Great food and service

title: Very nice drive
text: Beautiful drive on the coast of California with great points to stop and see the ocean view, worth the toll pay for entering

title: Amazing Tour
text:
Joined their Whale tour and had the chance to see the Blue Whale in real life.
Very professional stuff which made this an unforgotten experience for me and my family

title: Great Nature Escape
text:
Very impressive and well maintained area, great place to visit and see the redwood trees in nature.
If you plan to reach by car make sure to reserve parking space in advance through their site

title: Interesting Experience
text: Interesting and educational tour in Alcatraz prison, great audio tour which connect very well the place and its history.

title: Very special place
text: Visited together with my family, very interesting to place, great city view of Athens from this location and great view to old Athens history

title: Great food and service
text:
Visited with my family last week, we much enjoyed the food and service
The waiter was very nice and share pictures of the place and its rich history and it was very nice.
Great place for dinner with high quality food.

title: Excellent Quality
text:
I have visited there last week with my my family
The food was great and the quality was very high, we much enjoyed all the things we ordered. The stuff was very nice with great service!

title: Fun place for kids and adults
text: Spent a day with my family there and it was great, there are two main sections one for kids and the second for adults, all enjoyed and it was great escape from a winter day while inside it is very warm

title: Best Place for Ribs and Beer
text:
Visited there several times, one of my favorites place to eat in Amsterdam
The Ribs are amazing, very generous and reasonable price

title: Great food and great place
text:
Visited this restaurant two times lately and really like the food and atmosphere
Most recommended is the Black linguine and seafood for those who like tasty mix of Italian dish and seafood.
Looking forward for my next visit there with my family next week

title: magnificent fjord view near Bergen
text:
I have took this Fjord cruise together with my friend and it was very enjoyable
This was my first Fjord visit in Norway and it was very beautiful, especially while reaching the waterfall area and getting so close to the falling water.
Great view during the cruise and most recommended to stand on the front upstairs for non forgotten experience

title: Great place to visit, not to me missed if you visit in Garmisch
text:
Visited together with my son, very nice walk in the klamm
The way to the start point from the parking place was too far but other than that it was a great experience

title: Amazing Place for Cider lovers
text:
Visited this great place last week, really liked the atmosphere and friendly crew working at the bar, endless choices of Ciders and this is indeed a very nice place to enjoy your evening\night.
It was so great so I came back the day after to keep enjoying great cider recommended by the friendly Barman

title: Great family summer vacation
text:
We stayed in this resort for 5 days, 3 families 12 people in total
It was the best all inclusive resort we ever visited in Greece Islands
Very high quality of food, the stuff very friendly and most important it felt very relax and not crowded, for sure we will visit there again in the future

title: Excellent stay!
text:
Very nice hotel and stuff, very friendly and high quality of service
Very nice environment in the hotel area with lovely lake and nice view of the slope of Zugspitze.
Very clear we will stay in this hotel again in our next trip to this area
